Contacts API

Update a contact

PATCH

/

public

/

api

/

v1

/

inboxes

/

{inbox\_identifier}

/

contacts

/

{contact\_identifier}

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/public/api/v1/inboxes/{inbox_identifier}/contacts/{contact_identifier} \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
  "identifier": "1234567890",
  "identifier_hash": "e93275d4eba0e5679ad55f5360af00444e2a888df9b0afa3e8b691c3173725f9",
  "email": "alice@acme.inc",
  "name": "Alice",
  "phone_number": "+123456789",
  "custom_attributes": {}
}'
```

200

401

Copy

  "id": 123,

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#parameter-inbox-identifier)

inbox\_identifier

string

required

The identifier obtained from API inbox channel

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#parameter-contact-identifier)

contact\_identifier

string

required

The source id of contact obtained on contact create

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#body-identifier)

identifier

string

External identifier of the contact

Example:

`"1234567890"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#body-identifier-hash)

identifier\_hash

string

Identifier hash prepared for HMAC authentication

Example:

`"e93275d4eba0e5679ad55f5360af00444e2a888df9b0afa3e8b691c3173725f9"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#body-email)

email

string

Email of the contact

Example:

`"alice@acme.inc"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#body-name)

name

string

Name of the contact

Example:

`"Alice"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#body-phone-number)

phone\_number

string

Phone number of the contact

Example:

`"+123456789"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#body-avatar)

avatar

file

Send the form data with the avatar image binary or use the avatar\_url

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#body-custom-attributes)

custom\_attributes

object

Custom attributes of the customer

Example:

```
{}
```

#### Response

200

200401

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#response-id)

id

integer

Id of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#response-source-id)

source\_id

string

The session identifier of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#response-name)

name

string

Name of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#response-email)

email

string

Email of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/update-a-contact#response-pubsub-token)

pubsub\_token

string

The token to be used to connect to chatwoot websocket
